TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewCheckBoxCell extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell implements class System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingCell
Public Class DataGridViewCheckBoxCell Inherits DataGridViewCell Implements IDataGridViewEditingCell

summary.span: 显示要在 控件中使用的复选框用户界面 (UI)。

span.span: Displays a check box user interface (UI) to use in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是特殊的类型的用于显示一个复选框 UI 所示的二进制或三元信息。The class is a specialized type of used to display binary or ternary information presented through a check box UI. 在默认二进制模式下，单元格可以包含的值`true`或`false`。In the default binary mode, the cells can hold values of `true` or `false`. 在三元模式下，单元格可以之一上值。In ternary mode, the cells take on one of the values. 属性确定二进制或三元模式是否有效。The property determines whether binary or ternary mode is in effect. 列类型专用于保留此类型的单元格。The is the column type specialized to hold cells of this type. 默认情况下，函数将初始化为一个新。By default, the is initialized to a new . 若要在列的单元格模式的现有后，设置列的到要用作一种模式的单元格的属性。To pattern the cells within a column after an existing , set the column's property to the cell to use as a pattern. 列的单元格相关属性是同样名称的属性的模板单元格的包装。The cell-related properties of the column are wrappers for the similarly-named properties of the template cell. 更改模板单元格的属性值将只影响单元格在基于的模板在更改后添加。Changing the property values of the template cell will affect only cells based on the template that are added after the change. 更改列的单元格相关的属性值，但是，将更新模板单元格和列中的所有其他单元格并刷新列显示如有必要。Changing the cell-related property values of the column, however, will update the template cell and all other cells in the column, and refresh the column display if necessary. 当前单元格时、属性始终是`true`。When the current cell is a , the property is always `true`. 通常情况下，复选框单元格值旨在用于存储，如任何其他数据，或执行大容量操作。Typically, check box cell values are intended either for storage, like any other data, or for performing bulk operations. 如果你想要立即当用户单击复选框单元格，你可以处理响应事件，但此事件发生之前更新单元格的值。If you want to respond immediately when users click a check box cell, you can handle the event, but this event occurs before the cell value is updated. 如果在单击时需要的新值，一个选项是计算所需的值将是基于当前值。If you need the new value at the time of the click, one option is to calculate what the expected value will be based on the current value. 另一种方法是立即提交更改并处理事件以对其做出响应。Another approach is to commit the change immediately, and handle the event to respond to it. 若要在单击单元格时，请提交更改，你必须处理事件。To commit the change when the cell is clicked, you must handle the event. 在处理程序中，如果当前单元格，复选框单元格调用方法并传入值。In the handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the method and pass in the value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用以跟踪哪些员工在办公室。The following code example uses a to track which employees are in the office. 列由组成对象。The column is made up of objects. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#20)]

para.span: 派生自并将新属性添加到派生的类，请确保重写方法以在克隆操作过程中复制新属性。

span.span: When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.

para.span: 你还应调用基类的方法，以便基类的属性复制到新的单元格。

span.span: You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化属性值设置为`false`。This constructor initializes the property value to `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public DataGridViewCheckBoxCell (bool threeState);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool threeState) cil managed
Public Sub New (threeState As Boolean)
public: DataGridViewCheckBoxCell(bool threeState);

param.name: threeState
param.span: 表示启用三元状态； 表示启用二元状态。

span.span: to enable ternary state; to enable binary state.

summary.span: 初始化 类的一个新实例，并启用二元或三元状态。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, enabling binary or ternary state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 复选框的标准操作允许有两种状态： checked 和 unchecked。The standard operation of a check box allows for two states: checked and unchecked. 当`threeState`参数设置为`true`，允许其他、 不确定状态，它直观地表示由灰色部分检查。When the `threeState` parameter is set to `true`, an additional, indeterminate state is allowed, which is visually denoted by a grey partial check.

Public Overrides Function Clone () As Object
public: override System::Object ^ Clone();

summary.span: 创建此单元格的精确副本。

span.span: Creates an exact copy of this cell.
An that represents the cloned .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写方法每当派生自并将新属性添加到派生的类。Override the method whenever you derive from and add new properties to the derived class.

para.span: 在重写派生类中调用基类的方法，以便基类的属性复制到新的单元格，并确保也将复制任何已添加到派生的类的属性的值。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell, and be sure to also copy the values of any properties that were added to the derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前调用。 is called just before . 它必须返回`true`如果调用的取消共享已包含该单元格的行的效果。It must return `true` if the call to has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell. 它应返回`false`否则为。It should return `false` otherwise. 有关行共享的详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单元格的值更改时，标记为已修改，直到保存值，或从其数据源的数据重新初始化该单元格。When a cell's value changes, it is marked as modified until that value is saved or the cell is reinitialized with data from its data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重写的属性始终返回`null`复选框仅允许选择和取消选择，因为没有编辑。This overridden property always returns `null` because check boxes only allow selection and deselection, not editing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和属性确定这些状态相关联的值，因为它们在基础数据源中发生。The , , and properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source. 设置所属列的属性也设置属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用跟踪 office 照明的状态。The following code example uses a to track the status of office lighting. 属性将与相关联"turnedOff" `false`、属性将与相关联"turnedOn" `true`，和属性将相关联"未知"的不确定。The property associates "turnedOff" with `false`, the property associates "turnedOn" with `true`, and the property associates "unknown" to indeterminate. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/cpp/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/CS/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/VB/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.vb#0)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 平面样式不受此单元格类型。The flat style is not supported by this cell type. 设置所属列的属性也设置属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性，它是类似于此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. span.span: The value of the cell's data after formatting has been applied or if the cell is not part of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件调用此方法将一个单元格值转换为等效的显示值的类型由指示属性。The control calls this method to convert a cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the property. 控件将单元格的值传递给此方法在`value`参数。The control passes the cell value to this method in the `value` parameter. 此方法首先尝试转换`value`到或值使用， ，和如果已设置的属性。This method first attempts to convert `value` to a or value using the , , and properties if they have been set. 如果转换失败，事件发生。If the conversion is unsuccessful, the event occurs. 如果没有为此事件或处理程序集的处理程序属性`true`，将引发异常。If there is no handler for this event or the handler sets the property to `true`, an exception is thrown. 如果转换成功或没有处理程序事件，而且它不会设置属性`true`、事件发生。If the conversion is successful or there is a handler for the event and it does not set the property to `true`, the event occurs. A事件处理程序可以同时修改`value`和`cellStyle`。A event handler can modify both `value` and `cellStyle`. 如果处理程序不会设置属性`true`，但是，此方法设置的格式`value`使用的格式设置属性`cellStyle`对象。If the handler does not set the property to `true`, however, this method formats `value` using the formatting properties of the `cellStyle` object. 这可能会导致附加事件。This can result in an additional event. 如果格式设置为成功和`context`参数值包括值，此方法返回用于将复制到剪贴板的格式化值的版本。If formatting is successful and the `context` parameter value includes the value, this method returns the version of the formatted value for copying to the Clipboard. 否则，此方法返回以在中显示的格式化的值控件。Otherwise, this method returns the formatted value for display in the control.

summary.span: 获取或设置与不确定或 单元格值对应的基础值。

span.span: Gets or sets the underlying value corresponding to an indeterminate or cell value.

value.span: ，与不确定或 单元格值对应。

span.span: An corresponding to an indeterminate or cell value.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和属性确定这些状态相关联的值，因为它们在基础数据源中发生。The , , and properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source. 设置所属列的属性也设置属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用跟踪 office 照明的状态。The following code example uses a to track the status of office lighting. 属性将与相关联"turnedOff" `false`、属性将与相关联"turnedOn" `true`，和属性将相关联"未知"的不确定。The property associates "turnedOff" with `false`, the property associates "turnedOn" with `true`, and the property associates "unknown" to indeterminate. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/cpp/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/CS/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/VB/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.vb#0)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前调用。 is called just before . 它必须返回`true`如果调用具有相同自变量具有取消共享已包含该单元格的行的效果。It must return `true` if the call to with the same argument has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell. 它应返回`false`否则为。It should return `false` otherwise. 有关行共享的详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户编辑单元格值并提交更改，控件调用此方法将从显示的值转换到。When the user edits a cell value and commits the change, the control calls this method to convert the displayed value from the to the . 控件然后将设置为转换后的值的基础单元格的值或数据源值。The control then sets the underlying cell value or data source value to the converted value. 此方法将单元格的显示值转换为使用的值实际的单元格值， ，和如果已设置的属性。This method converts the display value of the cell to an actual cell value using the values of the , , and properties if they have been set.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否已对承载的复选框控件启用三元模式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether ternary mode has been enabled for the hosted check box control.

value.span: 如果启用三元模式，为 ；如果启用二元模式，则为 。

span.span: if ternary mode is enabled; if binary mode is enabled.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在三元模式下的第三个状态通常表示未初始化或不确定的值。The third state in ternary mode typically represents an uninitialized or indeterminate value. 设置所属列的属性也设置属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. 与列不同属性，该单元格属性不会自动更新属性关联的单元格样式时更改其值。Unlike the column property, the cell property does not automatically update the property of the associated cell style when you change its value. 当你更改单元格属性值设置为`true`，请务必设置属性返回的对象属性。When you change the cell property value to `true`, be sure to set the property of the object returned by the property to . 当你更改属性值设置为`false`，请务必设置属性`false`。When you change the property value to `false`, be sure to set the property to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用跟踪 office 照明的状态。The following code example uses a to track the status of office lighting. 属性将与相关联"turnedOff" `false`、属性将与相关联"turnedOn" `true`，和属性将相关联"未知"的不确定。The property associates "turnedOff" with `false`, the property associates "turnedOn" with `true`, and the property associates "unknown" to indeterminate. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/cpp/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/CS/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/VB/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.vb#0)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和属性确定这些状态相关联的值，因为它们在基础数据源中发生。The , , and properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source. 设置所属列的属性也设置属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用跟踪 office 照明的状态。The following code example uses a to track the status of office lighting. 属性将与相关联"turnedOff" `false`、属性将与相关联"turnedOn" `true`，和属性将相关联"未知"的不确定。The property associates "turnedOff" with `false`, the property associates "turnedOn" with `true`, and the property associates "unknown" to indeterminate. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/cpp/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/CS/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/VB/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.vb#0)]

summary.span: 获取单元格中的值的数据类型。

span.span: Gets the data type of the values in the cell.
The of the underlying value of the cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果尚未设置单元格的属性，则属性拥有使用时，如果列存在。If the property of the cell has not been set, then the property for the owning is used, if the column exists. 如果所属列不存在，则此属性设置为适合于其模式的默认类型：为二进制模式和为三元模式。If no owning column exists, then this property is set to the default type appropriate for its mode: for binary mode and for ternary mode. 是包含在单元格中的实际数据对象，而属性是此对象的格式的表示。The is the actual data object contained in the cell, whereas the property is the formatted representation of this object. 和属性分别对应于这些值的数据类型。The and properties correspond to the data types of these values, respectively.
